entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
